linked_card.name: Ravenous
linked_card.pack_name: The Blob That Ate Everything ELSE!
linked_card.real_text: Subject 5U-21 deck only. Permanent. Each time you devour a card, set it aside, out of play. You get +1 to each of your skills for each card beneath Ravenous (max +5). Forced - At the end of your turn: Devour a non-story card beneath Ravenous or controlled by an investigator at your location. If there is nothing beneath Ravenous, flip it over.
linked_card.text:
Subject 5U-21 deck only. Permanent.

Each time you devour a card, set it aside, out of play. You get +1 to each of your skills for each card beneath Ravenous (max +5).

Forced - At the end of your turn: Devour a non-story card beneath Ravenous or controlled by an investigator at your location. If there is nothing beneath Ravenous, flip it over.

name: Ravenous
pack_name: The Blob That Ate Everything ELSE!
real_text: Subject 5U-21 deck only. Permanent. Each time you devour a card, place it facedown beneath Ravenous. You get +1 to each of your skills for each card beneath Ravenous (max +5). Forced - If there are 5 or more cards beneath Ravenous: Flip it over.
text: Subject 5U-21 deck only. Permanent. Each time you devour a card, place it facedown beneath Ravenous. You get +1 to each of your skills for each card beneath Ravenous (max +5). Forced - If there are 5 or more cards beneath Ravenous: Flip it over.

name: Ravenous
pack_name: The Blob That Ate Everything ELSE!

Forced - At the end of your turn: Devour a non-story card beneath Ravenous or controlled by an investigator at your location. If there is nothing beneath Ravenous, flip it over.
text: Subject 5U-21 deck only. Permanent. Each time you devour a card, set it aside, out of play. You get +1 to each of your skills for each card beneath Ravenous (max +5). Forced - At the end of your turn: Devour a non-story card beneath Ravenous or controlled by an investigator at your location. If there is nothing beneath Ravenous, flip it over.

name: Regurgitation
pack_name: The Blob That Ate Everything ELSE!
real_text: Subject 5U-21 deck only. Fast. Play only during your turn. If Ravenous (Uncontrolled Hunger) is face up, flip it over. Choose and return up to 3 cards you devoured (beneath Ravenous or set-aside) to their owners' hands. For each card returned in this way, heal 1 damage and 1 horror.
text: Subject 5U-21 deck only. Fast. Play only during your turn. If Ravenous (Uncontrolled Hunger) is face up, flip it over. Choose and return up to 3 cards you devoured (beneath Ravenous or set-aside) to their owners' hands. For each card returned in this way, heal 1 damage and 1 horror.

name: Reality Acid
pack_name: The Blob That Ate Everything ELSE!
real_text: Revelation - If Ravenous (Controlled Hunger) is face up, flip it over. You devour a random aspect of reality. Reveal a random chaost token from the chaos bag and consult Reality Acid reference card to determine what you devoured.
text: Revelation - If Ravenous (Controlled Hunger) is face up, flip it over. You devour a random aspect of reality. Reveal a random chaost token from the chaos bag and consult Reality Acid reference card to determine what you devoured.

name: Reality Acid
pack_name: The Blob That Ate Everything ELSE!
real_text: Subject 5U-21 Devours... (If the chaos token revealed is not listed, or if the listed aspect cannot be devoured, reveal a new chaos token and consult the list again.) - [elder_sign]: ...a non-[[Elite]] enemy or treachery, at your location and worth no victory points. - +1: ...the top card of each investigator's discard pile. - 0: ...the top card of each investigator's deck. - -1: ...1 card at random from your hand. - -2: ...a non-story, non-weakness asset controlled by an investigator at your location. - -3: ...a player card attached to your location, or attached to an encounter card at your location. - -4: ...the top 2 cards of each investigator's deck. - -5: ...-3 cards of your choice from your hand. - -6: ...all events from each investigator's hand. - -7: ...a non-story, non-weakness asset from each investigator's play area. - -8: ...a non-weakness siganture card in any player's deck, hand, discard pile, or play area. - [skull]: ...1 card beneath Ravenous, at random. - [cultist]: ...each card committed to each skill test at your location (after the test ends), until the end of the next investigation phase. - [tablet]: ...each event played by investigators at your location, until the end of the next investigation phase. - [elder_thing]: ...the player card at your location with the most evidence, supplies, ammo, charges, or secrets on it. - [auto_fail]: Reveal 3 more chaos tokens and resolve each of those devour effects.
text: Subject 5U-21 Devours... (If the chaos token revealed is not listed, or if the listed aspect cannot be devoured, reveal a new chaos token and consult the list again.) - [elder_sign]: ...a non-[[Elite]] enemy or treachery, at your location and worth no victory points. - +1: ...the top card of each investigator's discard pile. - 0: ...the top card of each investigator's deck. - -1: ...1 card at random from your hand. - -2: ...a non-story, non-weakness asset controlled by an investigator at your location. - -3: ...a player card attached to your location, or attached to an encounter card at your location. - -4: ...the top 2 cards of each investigator's deck. - -5: ...-3 cards of your choice from your hand. - -6: ...all events from each investigator's hand. - -7: ...a non-story, non-weakness asset from each investigator's play area. - -8: ...a non-weakness siganture card in any player's deck, hand, discard pile, or play area. - [skull]: ...1 card beneath Ravenous, at random. - [cultist]: ...each card committed to each skill test at your location (after the test ends), until the end of the next investigation phase. - [tablet]: ...each event played by investigators at your location, until the end of the next investigation phase. - [elder_thing]: ...the player card at your location with the most evidence, supplies, ammo, charges, or secrets on it. - [auto_fail]: Reveal 3 more chaos tokens and resolve each of those devour effects.

name: G-Men
pack_name: The Blob That Ate Everything ELSE!
real_text: You get +1 to all skills. [reaction] When you would fail a skill test by exactly 1: Play G-Men from your hand. (This may cause the test to succeed.) Forced – At the end of the phase: Return G-Men to your hand.
text: You get +1 to all skills. [reaction] When you would fail a skill test by exactly 1: Play G-Men from your hand. (This may cause the test to succeed.) Forced – At the end of the phase: Return G-Men to your hand.

name: Corrosive Cloud
pack_name: The Blob That Ate Everything ELSE!
real_text: Uses (3 charges). [action] Spend 1 charge: Evade. If you succeed, automatically evade each enemy at your location and deal 1 damage to each of them. If a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], [elder_thing], or [auto_fail] symbol is revealed during this test, each investigator at your location takes 1 damage and loses 1 action.
text: Uses (3 charges). [action] Spend 1 charge: Evade. If you succeed, automatically evade each enemy at your location and deal 1 damage to each of them. If a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], [elder_thing], or [auto_fail] symbol is revealed during this test, each investigator at your location takes 1 damage and loses 1 action.

name: Alien Instruments
pack_name: The Blob That Ate Everything ELSE!
real_text: [action]: Investigate. Choose an exhausted [[Creature]] or [[Monster]] enemy at your location. The difficulty of this skill test is equal to the chosen enemy’s evade value. If you succeed, deal 1 damage to the chosen enemy and discover 1 additional clue at your location.
text: [action]: Investigate. Choose an exhausted [[Creature]] or [[Monster]] enemy at your location. The difficulty of this skill test is equal to the chosen enemy’s evade value. If you succeed, deal 1 damage to the chosen enemy and discover 1 additional clue at your location.
